com.google.gwt.dev.jjs.impl
Class JsIEBlockTextTransformer

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.dev.jjs.impl.JsAbstractTextTransformer
      com.google.gwt.dev.jjs.impl.JsIEBlockTextTransformer

public class JsIEBlockTextTransformer
extends JsAbstractTextTransformer

Limits top-level blocks to MAX_BLOCK_SIZE statements.

Used to close a trailing block which never filled.

Overrides:
endStatements in class JsAbstractTextTransformer

updateSourceInfoMap

protected void updateSourceInfoMap()
Fixes the index ranges of individual expressions in the generated JS after chunking statements into blocks that satisfy the IE block size problem. Loops over each expression, determines whether the statement in which it falls has a brace inserted before/after, and shifts forward according to where it falls in the block.

Specified by:
updateSourceInfoMap in class JsAbstractTextTransformer
